mapper.select: select * from post_name where title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postTitle}, '%') order by post_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_name (state, user_id, title, content, public_or, time) VALUES (#{state}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{public_or}, #{time})
mapper.update: UPDATE post_name SET state = #{state}, user_id = #{user_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, public_or = #{public_or}, time = #{time} WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
